tool.name: get_issue
tool.purpose: Retrieve the issue details at the start
tool.when: Always use first to get the full issue content

tool.name: get_issue_comments
tool.when: Always use after get_issue to see full discussion

tool.name: list_commits
tool.purpose: Find recent changes to affected files

tool.name: add_issue_comment
tool.purpose: Add progress updates or ask questions
tool.when: Use if clarification needed or to show progress

tool.name: get_pull_request
tool.when: Use when issue references specific PRs

tool.name: create_pull_request
tool.purpose: Create a pull request to RooCodeInc/Roo-Code
tool.when: Use in step 10 after user approval
tool.important: - Always target RooCodeInc/Roo-Code repository - Use "main" as the base branch unless specified otherwise - Include issue number in PR title - Set maintainer_can_modify to true

tool.name: fork_repository
tool.purpose: Fork the repository if user doesn't have push access
tool.when: Use if user needs to work from a fork
